name: All Evil Night
description:
From the town Evilween numerous messages about the monsters who flooded streets and requests for the help arrive. You are directed to check what occurs.On the road you get under a rockfall and bring down something suddenly run out on the road. Recovered, you notice that something terrible costs on the road, what you never had to meet. It something, remotely similar to the human, disappears in night. Without having the opportunity to drive further, you decide to find out what it is...

You will visit the gloomy forests, dark caves, cemetery, go down into the crypts, and meet monsters from your nightmares.
Fear will wait for you at every place. Be careful...

Key features:
Old shooters style.
Mystical atmosphere.
13 levels.
4 bosses.
11 kinds of enemies.
Search for door keys, items and ammunition.
Choosing a difficulty level.
